src:
Velika pobeda Kasiljasa: 6 meseci i 3 dana ležale ste u kutiji
04 Nov 2019, 16:21 by Zile
Golman Portoa, Iker Kasiljas, vratio se trenažnom procesu prvi put nakon infarkta.
Proslavljeni Španac je početkom maja ove godine doživeo infarkt i danas se prvi put nakon operacije i polugodišnjeg oporavka našao na terenu.
Mediji prenose da je Kasiljas radio po individualnom programu 20-25 minuta i da još uvek nije spreman da se uključi u treninge sa ostatkom tima. Svoj povratak na teren obeležio je fotografijom kopački i komentarom „6 meseci i 3 dana ležale ste u kutiji“.
Kasiljas je posle 16 godina provedenih u Realu pre četiri sezone prešao u Porto, a za nacionalni tim svoje zemlje igrao je 167 puta.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Big victory for Casillas: 6 months and 3 days you were in the box
04 Nov 2019, 15:21 by Zile
Porto's goalkeeper, Iker Casillas, returned to the training process for the first time since a heart attack.
The celebrated Spaniard suffered a heart attack at the beginning of May this year and found himself in the field for the first time since surgery and a six-month recovery.
The media reports that Casillas worked on an individual program for 20-25 minutes and that he was not yet ready to engage in training with the rest of the team. He marked his return to the field with a photo of a boot and the comment "You've been lying in a box for 6 months and 3 days."
After spending 16 years at Real Madrid, Casillas moved to Porto four seasons ago and played 167 times for his country's national team.
